comments.body: YES! YES! PLEASE CHANGE IT BACK! pvp and movement is so hard for me now, and the fact that it can't be moved back to the original position is ridiculous. and even if we had the ability to move the new dpad, the buttons are spaced out so sometimes when i'm running and jumping i just stop because my finger is too far down on the jump button. it's horrible! CHANGE IT BACK!
Best post ever I’m telling you the new controls are garbage
Everyone wants them back
I don't want the old D-pads back, but I think people deserve to be able to have the old controls back
I agree
PLEASE give us back our controls this is genuinely one of my worst nightmares
This makes a lot of sense. Minecraft has added functionalities to help colorblind players, so having a left handed setting is a great idea.
You can also switch your main hand to you left hand on Java.
I don't own a PC
Nolan’s has got to add this feature on bedrock already

Java has had this feature for a long time, why is it not in Bedrock? I mainly play Java and always switch my character to left handed. Playing in Bedrock without the option to have a left handed character just feels wrong to me.

I'm trying to enjoy the 15 Year Journey map but not having the option to make my character left handed is ruining it for me. I suppose I can try the option to hide my hands, but it's a poor workaround for a missing feature.
My son has autism and cannot use the new touch controls. He is so upset and crying because he can't play minecraft any more. Please make the old version as an option.
Also you can't remove the lefty mode people use that I can not play Minecraft not in lefty mode
I'm using an iPad and the new touch controls in 1.2.71 have made them unusable, please add an option to revert to the old touch control interface design!
The touch controls in 1.20.71 have ruined Minecraft - please change the Dpad controls back!!! Or include an option to change back to the previous layout and controls.
CHANGE IT BACK!!!!!!

I agree! The new controls are inconveniently placed and hard to use no matted how you change your settings! The old ones were fine and it makes no sense as to why they changed them to something that is barely functional.
the worst update of all time! might as well just delete our accounts

They messed the controls.... Again, but now even worst, cant even adjust the controls because "there is no space" Im really done! I cant play like this! Maybe is time to say goodbye to minecraft since they just do this kind of weird changes... At least put an option to put it all like before again! And Btw i use arrow ones (Split Screen Controls) And have the same issue as you guys!

Workaround for D-Pad issue:

If possible, try other control types on your touch devices, such as keyboard, mouse, etc.
I've been playing pocket edition since I was in grade 5. That was 12 years of using the old controls. PLEASE GIVE ME BACK MY D-PAD CONTROL
Great idea!
We definitely need this sort of thing!
I'd also love if the crosshair had no functionality option for Touch, it's just visual so you know where you're aiming.
You are a genius gigabrain moment
It's a pretty good solution. I agree!
Yeah this would make up for how bad getting items from the creative menu is now
Yeah!!
and make it so when you press the "sprint" button it acts like "control" on computers? so you can pick blocks with data.
That is a brilliant idea. It would make building a lot easier.
What about people who don’t use the crosshair?
I actually won't be playing again until they are back to normal

The D-pad, which was added to replace a button that was removed in a previous update, is very difficult and uncomfortable to use!
(I am Japanese and cannot use English, so I had to use translation software. Sorry if the text is difficult to read.)
I don't like the change, for me it's to hard to play the game. I don't like any of the touch controls right now
Revert the change! This new format absolutely sucks, at the very least give legacy options. Instead of releasing garbage like this how about the Mojang devs actually work on the heart of the game.

I usually never comment on these kinds of things, but I've played minecraft since I was 4 years old. This is my favorite game and it's shaped me as a person and these controls make the game frustrating and unplayable. I love the game, even if I'm not as excited about the new versions. But even with that, these controls make it completely unenjoyable. I just cannot play. Please add the old controls back!!
I'm using an iPad and the new touch controls in 1.2.71 have made them unusable, please add an option to revert to the old touch control interface design!

we need the old one back i strongly agree that this should best be done. really, i cannot deal with this. also, the way the old one was arranged really did meet more up to how i build, and it was much easier that way.
The touch controls in 1.20.71 have ruined Minecraft - please change the Dpad controls back!!! Or include an option to change back to the previous layout and controls.
I’m used to the old D-Pad control. The new one is difficult to navigate.

Please have an option between the classic d pad and the new pad. I would love to see the classic d pad as an option. The new one is so hard to play with especially when I’ve done it for 8 years and have muscle memory on the old d pad and now this one sucks.
Put the d-pad back to its original state, you've ruined the game's control.
I absolutely agree. The new controls are harder to use and way more awkward, at least a toggle to the old ones would be nice
I agree with you and other comments. A toggle to change it back would be nice.
So true I actually feel like I've gone back to being a noob ITS SO HARD TO MOVE WITH THEM
Same I hate how hard it is to use and want the old one back or to be able to choose the old one as a option
I'm using an iPad and the new touch controls in 1.2.71 have made them unusable, please add an option to revert to the old touch control interface design!

I personally find it really hard not to place blocks when using the new touch controls. They’ve all been moved upwards and more towards the center, and the flying controls are way more distant now. With the old controls, you weren’t able to place or break blocks if you touched near the controls. Now, if you miss by a single pixel, which everyone’ll do, you’ll place blocks accidentally.

The way to stop flying has also changed. There was a whole button for that. Now you have to double tap down.
The touch controls in 1.20.71 have ruined Minecraft - please change the Dpad controls back!!! Or include an option to change back to the previous layout and controls.
100% agree dont see the reason for change
this is a very good idea to add, surely all mcpe players will be happy if this feature is added. Come on, Mojang, please include this feature in the game.
Control nya terlalu mentok bawah anjir kalo di gedein kegedean posisi gak bisa di ubah apa coba
Gk enak bat njir tombol lompat ditouch diatas
Good idea
Mojang we need it

Yeah I also want this. And mojang if you are worried about space on small devices then you can give the feature of sneak to use off hand item just as we use shields. When players have to use the main hand they will not sneak and when the player have to use item in off hand they could just sneak and use it

But mojang please please please bring off hand support

Yeah I also want this. And mojang if you are worried about space on small devices then you can give the feature of sneak to use off hand item just as we use shields. When players have to use the main hand they will not sneak and when the player have to use item in off hand they could just sneak and use it

But mojang please please please bring off hand support
If I it could not come i quit minecraft
I truly hope it does come because that would improve the gameplay of survival way more than it was before, so yeah, Mojang please add this.
Please Mojang Enable Off Hand Feature For Bedrock And Pocket Edition. We Request You...
i 1000000000% agree. i have only played for five minutes since they changed and despite altering my settings over and over and over NOTHING will fix it or return me to my normal play style
i completely agree i won’t be playing until they get changed back
YES! I agree, I cannot play now! I have been on for like 10 years and I've gotten quite good on the old D pad, now I am actual trash bc of this change! FIX IT MOJANG
They completely messed up my controls too :( cant even play....
I used to like minecraft >:( at least dont replace it!

I agree. I cant move around how I used to. I tink they can keep the textures, but dont alter the placement of the buttons. They added gaps in the movement buttons which no longer allows you to move as well. You now have to lift your finger and place it on the direction you must move instead of draging it on the movement buttons. Its realy hard to play.
I find the new controls insufferable, it's so hard to move and I can't play like that
What might be a partial workaround for now is customising the d-pad position and/or size.

I'm definitely very late to this, but changing the size doesn't help because it's that far out from the edge of the screen. Also, playing in creative is much worse for mobile players because the flying changed too.

I completely agree and I won't be playing again until its fixed, although I don't think anyone actually finds the new one better, since the buttons are so spaced out, moving is almost completely impossible. Mojang, if you don't want to lose all your tablet/phone players, change it back.
I agree, can't move without randomly stopping. An unfortunate waste of money if it continues to be unplayable
I agree I have played this game for years. We need the old one back I can’t even play. It is so difficult with the new way
Couldn’t agree more!! We need the old d pad back i just don’t find Minecraft enjoyable anymore, because the new d pad is so hard to work with and all my muscle memory from the old d pad is useless.
Me too
I want to say that I probably won’t be playing Minecraft as much, or at all, since this new d-pad. Please, Minecraft, don’t ignore your oldest and most loyal users.
I’ve been playing on a tablet forever and I personally don’t like it, it feels too sticky and they should have an option for the old d pad
I LOVE THIS IDEA PLEAESE MOJANG
Or you open your inventory and just swap the items around like you would any other time (for Pocket Edition)

I mean, I got a solution for all players, touch and console
Here it is

https://feedback.minecraft.net/hc/en-us/community/posts/39240045514893-Offhand-For-bedrock-System-idea-For-all-users
It would be so sad when I would have to stop by playing Minecraft just because of this small change which could be so easy to change back or make it optional.
This is my situation too. Used to play minecraft every day now not at all. Give us the old controls back mojang, no one is benefitting from the new ones.

Yes please bring back the old d pad!! I have been playing Minecraft for 8 years. I used to play Minecraft everyday and gained a lot of muscle memory from it which is now all useless because of the new d pad. I would love to just be able to have an option to change it the the classic or keep the new. Minecraft just doesn’t feel enjoyable anymore with the new change.
Especially on larger devices like iPads its awful

the controls were perfect just the way they were the change is just inconvenient and takes up too much of the screen now especially due to the fact I’m playing on a small phone not to mention the years of muscle memory gone to waste I was the fastest builder in my friend group now big projects that would take a couple of hours now take me ages to do and I quickly lose motivation to play just change it back man or make it optional

I feel the exact same way about this. Especially when I’m trying to switch directions, it’s easy to just stop running entirely and it’s really annoying. I also dislike how the jump button now disappears when I fly and I have to double-tap fly down of all things to stop flying.

same. after the change it’s so hard to move.
Mojang change back to old please!!!
Yes!!! This new version is genuinely unplayable, even if it has something to do with the new weapon or features, I'd rather just not have those at all than deal with this

I hate this new look. It is extremely frustrating and impossible to play. Years of muscle memory can't just get used to it at once. If this change is supposed to lead you to the "correct way" of playing then let the new players do so, not the old one's! Atleast add a 4th option where we can have our old d-pad control aka the original!

My son is also having trouble with the new controls. They are place too high now and are difficult to reach comfortably. Please allow the controls to at least be moved to the bottom of the screen in the control editor. Thank you!
In the meantime, you can modify the controls to work slightly better. Open a world, go to settings, scroll down, and click on "touch." You can edit your controls position and size from there.
I'm using an iPad and the new touch controls in 1.2.71 have made them unusable, please add an option to revert to the old touch control interface design!
The touch controls in 1.20.71 have ruined Minecraft - please change the Dpad controls back!!! Or include an option to change back to the previous layout and controls.
I have hyper mobility joint spectrum disorder, and I am almost physically unable to play now! Kind of mad that a company that clames to be user friendly to all is like this
Yes yes
I agree
Bu özelliğin acilen gelmesi lazım

I agree.

And the bottons of the new touch controlls should be MOVABLE!!!
Yess I also voted for thiss
Yeah! The new one sucks and they removed some of the buttons! Why did they change it? No one complained about it being bad
Agreed
Agreed
PLEASE

Is this related to the pocket edition of Minecraft? Because yes, yes place change it back, even if you keep the new designs please change the positions back to where they were before and add back the wing button

I use the normal arrows in split screen control, now that they changed it, even with customized controls is really difficult to play :( they have to put an option to use the old control overlay... Im also an old player of MCPE

Customisation is great but we should be allowed the option to have it how it has always been. There weren't any issues with the looks or functions of the previous controls. I have been playing Minecraft for many, many years and the old controls are much preferred, they're what I'm used to and they're what I want.

And please. Also change back breaking blocks in Creative to how it once was. It used to be instant on follow up blocks, when you keep touching the screen. Now breaking every single block takes extra time. It is honestly tiring. All in all the new touch mechanics made the game (to me at least) unplayable.
The New Controls SUCK
Please add something good for the mobile players
Please add something good for the mobile players

yeah i completely agree, the new mobile touchpad controls are so difficult to handle and just make the game less enjoyable. minecraft should at least have an option to switch to the old design in game for the users that want it.

I agree, however it’s not just that it’s difficult to handle. For most people, and especially yourself, the controls they use would have been engraved in their muscle memory, making the switch from the old ones to current very difficult; even more so considering this is involuntary change for most people. I definitely want to see a switch back to the old D-Pad on mobile.
Pls support this post the new d-pad is horrible, the old one is 10000000000000x better:)

Plz do it we mobile users need off hand

Mainly for mace-windcharge combo torches
Aloo khaoge
Yess this would be added
Hopefully it comes sooner, this would really Help all the Bedrock players who cannot put anything in their offhand, and it can balance the parity in both version Java and Bedrock.
I hate the new controls for mobile plz change them back or make an option to I literally cannot play with the new controls

PLEASE GET THE OLD CONTROLS BACK ON THE PHONES!!!! I can’t even move and place or break blocks flying up and down it’s very very hard to even play now. I’m sooo frustrated! I won’t be playing until it’s changed back!

Exactly what I wanted to suggest, i craft huge amounts of paper on my world for trading with villagers and I waste a bunch of time just by crafting, worse thing of all is that a few versions ago crafting was way faster, but for some reason they just removed for no reason
Yes please add back faster crafting on mobile

I agree. I have been avidly playing minecraft pocket edition for about 9-10 years now. This change is the single most frustrating thing I have seen since starting the game. I have gotten so used to the old D pad over playing for so long that this change has made me worse than the average cubecraft player. Please bring the D pad back, we all want it. If somehow Mojang reads this, make it a toggleable option to change, it does not harm anyone, its best for all. The spacing is all messed up in the new version + the swim options don't feel normal to me and lots of other players.
They should put an option to use the old ones, is such uncomfortable
